alert.note: Alert for Bee; Inland Refugio; Inland San Patricio (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 22 at 7:53AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central San Patricio, southwestern Refugio and southeastern Bee Counties through 845 AM CDT... At 752 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Papalote, or 9 miles north of Sinton, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Woodsboro, Skidmore, St. Paul and Papalote. This includes the following highways... US Highway 181 between mile markers 606 and 618. US Highway 77 between mile markers 628 and 644. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bee; Inland Refugio; Inland San Patricio
